abstract: The departures of two top UBS investment bankers, James Glerum and Cary Kochman, are the latest in a series of defections from the struggling Swiss firm.
snippet: The departures of two top UBS investment bankers, James Glerum and Cary Kochman, are the latest in a series of defections from the struggling Swiss firm.
lead_paragraph: The exodus from UBS continued as Citigroup announced on Wednesday that it had hired two top investment bankers from the struggling Swiss institution.

headline.main: Citi Hires 2 More UBS Bankers as Exodus Continues

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
